Dec 12, 2002

Trent Lott Supported White-Supremacist Group

“Emerging evidence shows Trent Lott addressed a white supremacist group at least twice in the 1990’s and is on record praising the group, contradicting statements the Senator’s spokesperson made to reporters this past weekend.” FAIR Media Advisory
